abstract: Altec Lansing’s new T515 is designed to perform as a phone’s musical companion, doing it wirelessly with Bluetooth technology.
snippet: Altec Lansing’s new T515 is designed to perform as a phone’s musical companion, doing it wirelessly with Bluetooth technology.
lead_paragraph: As owners of iPods and other music players often discover, it’s nice to have speakers for the players so that headphones aren’t needed all the time. But what if your songs are on your phone?

headline.main: A Musical Team of Phone and Speakers, Brought Together by Bluetooth
headline.print_headline: A Musical Team of Phone and Speakers, Brought Together by Bluetooth
